text: khaṇḍitavāgiyū maryamara putra masīharē allāhanendu vādisidavaru dhikkārigaḷāgi biṭṭaru. Hēḷiri; ondu vēḷe allāhanu maryamara putra īsārannū, avara tāyiyannū, bhūmiyalliruva ellarannū nāśa māḍa bayasidare, avanannu yāru tānē taḍeyaballaru? Ākāśagaḷa, bhūmiya mattu avugaḷa naḍuve iruva ellavugaḷa adhikāravu allāhanigē sēride. Avanu tānicchisiddannu sr̥ṣṭisuttāne. Allāhanu ellavannū māḍalu śaktanāgiddāne
